title: Leaverbuster. You so funneh.
body:
1. Disconnected for 5-10min, restarts laptop.
2. Logs Back In.
3. Gets assists/kills.
4. Finishes game in Victory.
5. Gets told Leaver Buster is going to ban me for LEAVING.
6. Everything says I've been Victory and not Leaver.
Please explain. Rito.
<3
